abstract.t: Mechanisms for handling congestion in Ethernet pseudowires arepresented. These mechanisms extend capabilities of the nativeservice across the PSN, and require use of the PWE3 control word.Requirements LanguageThe key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT","SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in thisdocument are to be interpreted as described in RFC 2119 [RFC2119].
